thread.title: BOE’s Carney: Rate Rise Plans Could Change in Response to ‘Sharper’ Brexit

author: Paul Hannon
title: BOE’s Carney: Rate Rise Plans Could Change in Response to ‘Sharper’ Brexit
text:
The Bank of England could forgo planned rises in its key interest rate, or even ease policy, if the U.K.’s departure from the European Union were to be “sharper” than it expects, Gov. Mark Carney said Thursday.
The BOE has said if the economy grows around 1.75% a year, it would raise its key rate up to three times over coming years. However,...
